root.name: Hell Hole
root.description: Â Shoot a pterodactyl to kill. Hell Hole is a C64 arcade shooter. The main character is a nameless commando who has to get through all 4 game's levels by fighting a variety of creatures (pterodactyls, spiders, gladiators etc.) with different guns/ ammo types and skilfully jumping from one platform to another. Each level has a different theme, however some enemies appear in multiple stages.
